GxFilters

Class GxFilterSetFilter

  • GxColumnFilterAG
    • GxFilterSetFilter

  • public class GxFilterSetFilter
extends GxColumnFilterAG

    GxFilterSetFilter allow you to filter on set data, influenced by how filters work in Microsoft Excel


    #Enterprise

    See Also:
    []

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and TypeField and Description
      BBjNumberApplyMiniFilterWhileTyping!

      Set to true to apply the Set Filter immediately when the user is typing in the Mini Filter. Default: false

      GxRendererInterfaceCellRenderer!

      Provide a cell renderer for each value

      BBjNumberDefaultToNothingSelected!

      Set this to true to instead show all values as de-selected by default. Default: false

      BBjNumberSuppressMiniFilter!

      Set to true to hide the mini filter.

      BBjNumberSuppressRemoveEntries!

      Set to true to stop the filter from removing values that are no longer available (like what Excel does).

      since version 0.102.0, GxFilterSetFilter.SuppressRemoveEntries is deprecated / removed. Use GxFilterSetFilter.NewRowsAction instead.

      BBjNumberSuppressSelectAll!

      Set to true to remove the "select all" checkbox.

      BBjNumberSuppressSorting!

      If true, sorting will not be done on the set filter values. Use this if providing your own values and don't want them sorted as you are providing in the order you want.

      BBjNumberSuppressSyncValuesAfterDataChange!

      Set to true to have the values inside the set filter NOT refresh after values are changed inside the grid.

      JsonArrayValues!

      The values to display in the filter. If this is not set, then the filter will takes its values from what is loaded in the table. Setting it allows you to set values where the value may not be present in the list (for example, if you want to show all states in America so that the user is not confused by missing states, even though states are missing from the data set in the grid)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and TypeMethod and Description
      JsonObjectgetAsJsonObject()

      Convert the filter definition to Json Object

      static BBjStringgetFilterName()
      {@inheritDoc}
      BBjNumbergetSuppressRemoveEntries()

      Return true when the filter will not remove unavailable values , false otherwise

      BBjNumbergetSuppressSyncValuesAfterDataChange()

      Return true when the values inside the set filter will not refresh after values are changes inside the grid

      voidsetSuppressRemoveEntries(BBjNumber suppress!)

      Set to true to stop the filter from removing values that are no longer available (like what Excel does).

      voidsetSuppressSyncValuesAfterDataChange(BBjNumber suppress!)

      Set to true to have the values inside the set filter NOT refresh after values are changed inside the grid.

      • ApplyMiniFilterWhileTyping!

        public BBjNumber ApplyMiniFilterWhileTyping!

        Set to true to apply the Set Filter immediately when the user is typing in the Mini Filter. Default: false

      • CellRenderer!

        public GxRendererInterface CellRenderer!

        Provide a cell renderer for each value

      • DefaultToNothingSelected!

        public BBjNumber DefaultToNothingSelected!

        Set this to true to instead show all values as de-selected by default. Default: false

      • SuppressMiniFilter!

        public BBjNumber SuppressMiniFilter!

        Set to true to hide the mini filter.

      • SuppressRemoveEntries!

        public BBjNumber SuppressRemoveEntries!

        Set to true to stop the filter from removing values that are no longer available (like what Excel does).

        since version 0.102.0, GxFilterSetFilter.SuppressRemoveEntries is deprecated / removed. Use GxFilterSetFilter.NewRowsAction instead.

      • SuppressSelectAll!

        public BBjNumber SuppressSelectAll!

        Set to true to remove the "select all" checkbox.

      • SuppressSorting!

        public BBjNumber SuppressSorting!

        If true, sorting will not be done on the set filter values. Use this if providing your own values and don't want them sorted as you are providing in the order you want.

      • SuppressSyncValuesAfterDataChange!

        public BBjNumber SuppressSyncValuesAfterDataChange!

        Set to true to have the values inside the set filter NOT refresh after values are changed inside the grid.

      • Values!

        public JsonArray Values!

        The values to display in the filter. If this is not set, then the filter will takes its values from what is loaded in the table. Setting it allows you to set values where the value may not be present in the list (for example, if you want to show all states in America so that the user is not confused by missing states, even though states are missing from the data set in the grid)

      • getSuppressRemoveEntries

        public BBjNumber getSuppressRemoveEntries()

        Return true when the filter will not remove unavailable values , false otherwise

        Returns:
        BBjNumber
        Deprecated:
        since version 0.102.0, GxFilterSetFilter.getSuppressRemoveEntries() is deprecated / removed. Use GxFilterSetFilter.getNewRowsAction() instead.

      • getSuppressSyncValuesAfterDataChange

        public BBjNumber getSuppressSyncValuesAfterDataChange()

        Return true when the values inside the set filter will not refresh after values are changes inside the grid

        Returns:
        BBjNumber
        Deprecated:
        since version 0.102.0, GxFilterSetFilter.getSuppressSyncValuesAfterDataChange() is deprecated / removed. Use GxFilterSetFilter.getNewRowsAction() instead.

      • setSuppressRemoveEntries

        public void setSuppressRemoveEntries(BBjNumber suppress!)

        Set to true to stop the filter from removing values that are no longer available (like what Excel does).

        Parameters:
        BBjNumber suppress!
        Deprecated:
        since version 0.102.0, GxFilterSetFilter.setSuppressRemoveEntries(BBjNumber suppress!) is deprecated / removed. Use GxFilterSetFilter.setNewRowsAction(BBjString action!) instead.

      • setSuppressSyncValuesAfterDataChange

        public void setSuppressSyncValuesAfterDataChange(BBjNumber suppress!)

        Set to true to have the values inside the set filter NOT refresh after values are changed inside the grid.

        Parameters:
        BBjNumber suppress!
        Deprecated:
        since version 0.102.0, GxFilterSetFilter.setSuppressSyncValuesAfterDataChange(BBjNumber suppress!) is deprecated / removed. Use GxFilterSetFilter.setNewRowsAction(BBjString action!) instead.
